about.title: About
about.description: Based in Agnes Water Australia, De Maine is family run software house developing unique boutique software for a miriad of sectors. Our clients have presented us with challenges that led us on a path to creating some truely unique software and digital experiences.

projects.name: Solid State
projects.short: OpenSource Platform for trading artwork as shares
projects.description: An open-source platform for trading artworks as shares that serves as a base for future possible web3 trading applications. Includes a Python 3 Brownie back-end for Solidity contract development deployment and testing, a Nodejs Rest Api for deploying artwork contracts to the Ethereum blockchain and IPFS file storage, and a React front-end.

projects.name: Luminous Light Festival
projects.description: AI based Interactive mapped projections for the GLadstone Regional Councils's Luminous Light Festival. Punters load their faces into the application from a Android Based Tablet Kiosk, where AI sorts them into Male, Female and Age. Three speate projections of Adult Male, Adult Female and Child are projected on to foliage on the banks of a creek.

projects.name: Luminous Light Festival
projects.description: WE:\Triad at Luminous Light Festival Gladstone July 2019 is a digital projection installation the used Deep Learning Algorithms to categorise captured faces, into adult male, female and child. Caught faces are transformed into 3d meshes that are animated via mesh morphing and alpha blending. The public add their faces to WE via a tablet mounted on the temporary fencing to the left of the projections. Conceptually WE:\Triad navigates the premise that the triad of humanity, man, woman and child is an ancient entropy defeating organism.
projects.head: /assets/img/works/head-luminous-2019.jpg
